lines.text: ...Why would I want to do that?
I mean, you've seen the crime scene, right? It's a mess out there!
There's bound to be evidence that I <c=#FF00FF>just don't need,</c> at some point.
Things that we already figured out the point of, red herrings, or enigmas we just can't see being useful yet.
If I turn off the lights with <c=#FF00FF>X,</c> that evidence <c=#FF00FF>won't come to mind</c> when people ask me questions.
Of course, if I'm wrong, and some piece of evidence turns out to be important later...
